about_the_game:
You are inside a hauntingly beautiful little space—a mind nearly consumed by Angst.

Within its fragile realm lurk creatures diverse in character, appearance, and abilities: some kind, others childish, unhinged, immoral, wicked—or simply afraid.

Will he face them—or be consumed entirely?

                                                            

EVERYTHING IS JUST... SHADES OF BLUE

Caged in a tiny box, the mind is shrouded by darkness. It’s a paradox—seemingly motionless, yet ever shifting in form and matter. Will he find a way to escape this cage, or be consumed by its unchanging gloom?

MEET ANGST, CONFRONT ANGST, ELIMINATE ANGST

Angst has invaded his mind. Where does it come from? Why is it here? How many forms did it take? Who—or what—is it? Does it even matter? Perhaps, perhaps not. The real question is: Will he be devoured by Angst… or find the strength to overcome it?

                                                       

ALWAYS FOLLOW THE CONTRACT

You cannot proceed without first accepting the contracts. They are, truly, for your own safety. Adhere to these contracts, and you will be assured a happy ending... so to speak.

REVISIT THE PAST CHANGE YOUR REGRETS

Does failure seal your fate? Perhaps not—not if you have me by your side. Retrace your missteps, uncover new possibilities, and grasp the ending you long for.

         

                                                

  • A branching narrative where your choices can spark a happy ending—or something else entirely...

  • An interactive Visual Novel where even simple acts—cracking eggs, popping balloons, shattering glasses—become strangely significant.

  • Blue is a lovely color. But maybe there’s a tad too much of it…

  • You are not the protagonist—yet you’ll hear every thought and feeling in an intimate first-person narration.

  • Time Travel! Jump back into key moments and rewrite fate… if you dare.

  • 7+ Angst Entities, each one a manifestation of anxiety itself.

  • Contracts! Many, many contracts to accept.

  • Relaxation. Believe it or not, this mind can still find its moments of calm.

BlueMinded is a choice-driven psychological horror visual novel offering an emotional narrative, evocative atmosphere, and surreal experiences.

I hear it again. That voice.

Where am I? I don’t know. Just... nowhere.

Does it matter?

No. Not at all.

The voice slithers through my thoughts, coiling tighter with every word. It doesn’t ask. It commands. It demands.

Sign the contract, it says. Face them. Face Angst.

The world around me bleeds blue.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains themes of depression, suicide, and other sensitive topics, which may be uncomfortable for some players.
